name: Purple leather wrap bracelet with pearl clasp
description:
This handmade wrap leather bracelet features a freshwater pearl clasp. Fashionable, fun to wear, and versatile, they come in 7 leather color combinations (and one deerskin) in 3 sizes. 

They also make perfect gifts! Order yours today.

Sizes: small (20"), medium (21") and large (22")

name: Orbiting Pearl Necklace Kit

Pearl and leather colors vary.

name: Turquoise
description:
A preselected collection of unique beads for you to design your own long wraparound necklace or bracelet! An excellent choice for the novice designer. And a terrific, affordable gift for the newcomer to beading.

Bead boxes are created in limited editions; individual beads will vary per box.  Our selection is ever-changing.

name: 100pc 4mm White Opal Swarovski Crystal Beads / other sizes available
description:
Swarovski crystal beads are machine cut and polished to the highest quality in Austria. They are, simply put, the finest crystal beads available. Ayla offers a wide variety of shapes, sizes and colors.

Price is per bag of 100.

Did you know? 

The chandelier in the film version of Phantom of the Opera is built with Swarovski crystals… 

Many of Michael Jackson’s costumes sparkle with them as well!

Swarovski crystal beads are machine cut and polished to the highest quality in Austria. They are, simply put, the finest crystal beads available. Ayla offers a wide variety of shapes, sizes and colors.

Price is per bag of 100.

Did you know? 

The chandelier in the film version of Phantom of the Opera is built with Swarovski crystals… 

Many of Michael Jackson’s costumes sparkle with them as well!

Strings of 8mm crystals are available by calling Ayla at 847-328-0644

name: Beading Starter Kit
description:
If you're a beginner and you need a couple of tools to get started, order the Beading Starter Kit! In addition to a needlenose beading plier and a wirecutter, you get sterling silver clasps and crimps, a bead stopper and enough softflex for five (5) beading projects! 

Also includes instructions.

This is a great gift idea!

name: Soft Flex Beading Wire 30 feet (.014 fine)
description:
Soft Flex Beading Wire is the industry standard for your beading projects.  It is the best on the market!

This fine-grade wire is perfect for pearls and other small hole beads, including gemstones.

Also available in 10 feet.

name: Soft Flex Beading Wire 30 feet (.019 med.)
description:
Soft Flex Beading Wire is the industry standard for your beading projects.  It is the best on the market!

This medium-grade wire is perfect for your average size bead in terms of hole size and weight.

Also available in 10 feet.

name: Soft Flex Beading Wire 30 feet (.024 Heavy)
description:
This nylon coated, stainless steel beading wire is the best on the market.  This gauge is excellent for abrasive materials and large, heavy stones.

Also available in 10 feet.

name: German Silver Balls 6mm
description:
German Silver - an alloy of nickel, copper and zinc- gives the look of real silver at an affordable price. 

6mm rounds of German Silver with a lightly textured finish are an interesting addition to any project.

name: German Silver Potatoes
description:
German silver, also called nickel silver, looks just like gleaming sterling but is made of a copper, nickel, and zinc alloy. 

These finely crafted beads are a lightweight, attractive alternative to more expensive sterling. Combine them with brass beads for a really rich look.

name: German Silver Pillows
description:
German Silver - an alloy of nickel, copper and zinc- gives the look of real silver at an affordable price. 

These plump German Silver pillows embellish your design with a textured finish.

name: German Silver Flat Shields
description:
German silver, also called nickel silver, looks just like gleaming sterling but is made of a copper, nickel, and zinc alloy. 

These finely crafted beads are a lightweight, attractive alternative to more expensive sterling. Combine them with brass beads for a really rich look.

name: German Silver Flat Pillows
description:
German Silver - an alloy of nickel, copper and zinc- gives the look of real silver at an affordable price. 

Flat pillows of German Silver look soft enough to take a nap on.

name: German Silver Large Flat Cubes
description:
German silver, also called nickel silver, looks just like gleaming sterling but is made of a copper, nickel, and zinc alloy. 

These finely crafted beads are a lightweight, attractive alternative to more expensive sterling. Combine them with brass beads for a really rich look.

name: German Silver Faceted Pillows
description:
German silver, also called nickel silver, looks just like gleaming sterling but is made of a copper, nickel, and zinc alloy. 

These finely crafted beads are a lightweight, attractive alternative to more expensive sterling. Combine them with brass beads for a really rich look.

name: German Silver Saucers
description:
These unique beads add a dazzling color and shape to any strand.

Mixes well with with gemstone chunks and glass beads. Very versatile!

name: Brass Cubes (light)
description: A brighter version of the cube shape. Adds variety to the range of choices in brass.

name: Brass Cubes (dark)
description: Small brass cubes are real eye-catchers. The muted color of the brass is a surprise!

name: Brass Potatoes
description: A small potato shape with striated finish gives these brass beads a rich, shiny texture.

name: Beadbox Purple Mist
description:
A preselected collection of unique beads for you to design your own long wraparound necklace! An excellent choice for the novice designer. And a terrific, affordable gift for the newcomer to beading.

Finished example shown is made from a similar beadbox.

Bead boxes are created in limited editions of 6-10.

name: Beadbox Gunmetal
description:
A preselected collection of unique beads for you to design your own long wraparound necklace or bracelet! An excellent choice for the novice designer. And a terrific, affordable gift for the newcomer to beading.

Bead boxes are created in limited editions; individual beads will vary per box.  Our selection is ever-changing.

name: Beadbox Gray Matter
description:
A preselected collection of unique beads for you to design your own long wraparound necklace! An excellent choice for the novice designer. And a terrific, affordable gift for the newcomer to beading.

Finished example shown is made from a similar beadbox.

Bead boxes are created in limited editions of 6-10.

name: Tiny E6000 glue
description:
A high performance industrial formula glue. Dries clear and paintable.

For crafts and small repairs. One drop does it!

name: Euro Tool Super Glue
description:
A new formula with superior holding quality.

Great for jewelry and other crafts.

name: Stretch Magic 1 mm
description:
A flexible beading string that is best for bracelets and necklaces. Your beads will slide easily over wrist or head. A heavier version of Stretch magic.

Terrific for children's projects.

name: Stretch Magic .5 mm
description:
A flexible beading string that is best for bracelets and necklaces. Your beads will slide easily over wrist or head.

Terrific for children's projects.

name: 10mm Big Hole Light Pink Pearls - 8" strand
description: These light pink pearls are "potato" in shape and have a beautiful luster. The hole for stringing is 1.7mm in diameter.

name: 12mm Big Hole Dark Pink Pearls - 8" strand
description: These dark pink pearls are "potato" in shape and have a beautiful luster. The hole for stringing is 1.7mm in diameter.

name: 10mm Big Hole Peacock Pearls - 8" strand
description: These peacock pearls are baroque in shape and have a beautiful luster. The hole for stringing is 1.7mm in diameter.

name: 12mm Big Hole Silver Pearls - 8" Strand
description: These silver pearls are "potato" shaped and have a beautiful luster. The hole for stringing is 1.7mm in diameter.

name: 12mm Big Hole Soft White Pearls - 8" strand
description: These soft white pearls are baroque in shape and have a beautiful luster. The hole for stringing is 1.7mm in diameter.

name: Camel Color Leather Strips - 2' x 3/8" $10
description:
These strips are great for wrapped bracelets, necklaces, pearls, large hole beads, perforating... the strips are 3/8" in width and are pre-perforated on one end. 

The bracelet shown is an example of what you can do!

Buy 3 for only $25!

description:

Buy 3 for only $25!

name: Leather Cord - 5 Yards Black $10
description: This leather cord is a great value. Use it to string large hole beads or for suspending pendants. Bracelets too!

name: Leather Cord - 5 Yards Brown/Chocolate $10
description: This leather cord is a great value. Use it to string large hole beads or for suspending pendants. Bracelets too!

name: 4mm Silver Plate Chips - 16" strand
description:
These high-quality beads are 4mm in diameter, and are created from silver plated solid (not hollow) brass. These beautiful silver plated beads are a great alternative to expensive sterling products.

We like to use these in combination with chain and gemstones for a really rich look.

name: 3mm Silver Plate Cube Beads - 16" strand
description:
These high-quality beads are 3mm in diameter, and are created from silver plated solid (not hollow) brass. These beautiful silver plated beads are a great alternative to expensive sterling products.

We like to use these in combination with chain and gemstones for a really rich look.

name: 4mm Silver Plate Pukalet Beads - 16" strand
description:
These high-quality beads are 4mm in diameter, and are created from silver plated solid (not hollow) brass. These beautiful silver plated beads are a great alternative to expensive sterling products.

We like to use these in combination with chain and gemstones for a really rich look.

name: 3mm Silver Plate Pukalet Beads - 16" strand
description:
These high-quality beads are 3mm in diameter, and are created from silver plated solid (not hollow) brass. These beautiful silver plated beads are a great alternative to expensive sterling products.

We like to use these in combination with chain and gemstones for a really rich look.

name: 3mm Brass Pukalet Beads - 16" strand
description:
These high-quality beads are 3mm in diameter, and are created from solid (not hollow) brass. A beautiful gold color, they are a great alternative to more expensive solid gold beads. 

We like to use these in combination with chain and gemstones for a really rich look.

name: David Christensen Furnace Glass - 1 Ounce Dichroic
description:
David Christensen is the top cane bead artist in the world. His sophisticated caned glass beads are created when rods of heated glass (known as canes) are grouped together - then the canes are then pulled, cut and shaped.

One ounce (the amount shown) of dichroic furnace glass is regularly $20 per ounce in our store. At our online store we are offering it for just $14 an ounce while supplies last! Since each bead is handmade, assortment will vary.

If you are looking for the highest quality furnace glass, look no further!
